attributes.action: allow the British electorate to demonstrate their disgust and remove those who have shown a lack of moral fibre.The calling a general election within the month is called for..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The resignation of the speaker must be seen as the first step in a cleansing of our political establishment. He must not be only a scapegoat. Let the people remove those who have let us down and those who have stood by and watched them let us down.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
